issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

After fixing #729 the statusLabel in the scrollview is not displaying until you add several sets of status to it. If you put a log message in, you can see that the data is valid on the first network response.

{html}
fields.summary: Android: Twitter status doesn't display properly.

comments.body:
{html}

(from [cdefa12030b681e78fbd69a48d2b199e29487084]) we forgot to measure each child before asking for it's measured dimensions. this fixes some weirdness seen when using "auto" in contentWidth/Height and "auto" for ScrollView children. also added an android-only "scrollType" property that users can use to explicitly set the type of ScrollView this is. [#814 state:resolved] http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/cdefa12030b68...

{html}
